# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate object that controls the preview panel’s behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var delegate: AnyObject! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The class assigned as the delegate should conform to the [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanelDelegate] protocol.
